tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1955'
tax_brackets.notes: The values here are an approximation of the 1955 tax system. The system was a progressive structure with rates increasing by 3 pence for every £100. The rates here include a 20% rebate that was in effect for the 1955-56 tax year. This rebate was capped at £75, which is not modelled here. The top rate of 68% is from the placeholder file and is assumed to be the maximum rate.

ietc.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2009).

wff.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2005).

ppl.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2002).

child_support.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 1991).

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1955'
acc_levy.notes: ACC scheme did not exist in this year.
